properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELCT ROWNUM "RNUM", A.* FROM ( SELECT CONSULT_NO , CONSULT_TITLE , TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') "ENROLL_DATE" , CONSULT_CATEGORY , ANSWER_STATUS FROM CONSULT C JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE C.USER_NO = ? , C.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COUNSULT_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM CONSULT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT CONSULT_NO , USER_Id , CONSULT_TITLE , CONSULT_CONTENT , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.MODIFY_DATE , CONSULT_ANSWER , ANSWER_DATE , C.STATUS , ORIGIN_NAME , FILE_PATH , CONSULT_CATEGORY , RESPONDENTS , ANSWER_STATUS FROM CONSULT C JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE M.USER_NO = ? AND C.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CONSULT_NO DESC

INSERT INTO CONSULT ( CONSULT_NO , USER_NO , CONSULT_TITLE , CONSULT_CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , ORIGIN_NAME , FILE_PATH , CONSULT_CATEGORY , ANSWER_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CONSULTNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , 'Y' , ? , ? , ? , '미답변' )

SELECT CONSULT_NO , M.USER_NO , CONSULT_TITLE , CONSULT_CONTENT , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.MODIFY_DATE , CONSULT_ANSWER , ANSWER_DATE , C.STATUS , ORIGIN_NAME , FILE_PATH , CONSULT_CATEGORY , RESPONDENTS , ANSWER_STATUS FROM CONSULT C JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = C.USER_NO) WHERE C.CONSULT_NO = ? AND C.STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE CONSULT SET CONSULT_TITLE = ? , CONSULT_CATEGORY = ? , CONSULT_CONTENT = ? , ORIGIN_NAME = ? , FILE_PATH = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE CONSULT_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE CONSULT SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE CONSULT_NO = ?
UPDATE CONSULT SET CONSULT_ANSWER = ? , ANSWER_DATE = SYSDATE , RESPONDENTS = 1 , ANSWER_STATUS = '답변완료' WHERE CONSULT_NO = ?
